summary: Complete testing of CV app (Europass format) for Mediha Dubravić. All core functionality working correctly - PDF export fixed, frontend properly configured, all API endpoints functional.
passed_tests: POST /api/export-pdf generates valid 65KB PDF with %PDF header
Frontend CV app loads with all sections (7/7 sections found)
Export PDF button is clickable and functional
All CV sections render properly (Contact, Personal Info, About, Experience, Education, Skills, Languages)
Edit functionality with password protection working

success_percentage.integration: 100% (CV data flows correctly between backend and frontend)
